metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27067 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the l2tp subsystem, there is a possible use after free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-152409173

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27067` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-lowlatency - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-10.11').
